abstract: New York’s attorney general, Eric Schneiderman, says he intends to scrutinize the T-Mobile deal to be sure it does not lead to higher consumer prices.
snippet: New York’s attorney general, Eric Schneiderman, says he intends to scrutinize the T-Mobile deal to be sure it does not lead to higher consumer prices.
lead_paragraph: With a deal as big as AT&T‘s $39 billion purchase of T-Mobile USA, a little regulatory review is to be expected.

headline.main: New York Attorney General Weighs In on AT&T’s Deal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
